title: Who am I?

extra.data:
I also have experience in using Tailwind and Bootstrap, which are CSS frameworks, as well as React component libraries like Material UI, and more. My goal is to be flexible and choose the technologies that help me achieve my objectives.
I also prefer to develop in TypeScript, which is a Typed Superset of JavaScript..

title: My career so far
kicker: I have nearly 20 years of experience in various professional areas within web development. I have worked at both strategic and operational levels.

extra.data: I enjoy working in a process-oriented manner and continuously improving work methodologies that drive progress. Much of my previous knowledge has been carried over into my role as a frontend developer.
